channel.title: More help!
channel.description: i just made a topic for help with my auto dropper but i changed to auto woodcutter but coz its not good you can only stand in one place (behind lumbridge general store see pic.)and only cut one tree(oak) has no anti randoms/ban.im not asking you to use this script btw if you do dont use on your mains download first attachment too see were too start and second 4 script thanks for your help ~~~sonny bill 9~~~

yeah that realy helped and ill add a.s.a.p

[br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2007, 01:09:48 AM[/size][hr]oh i noticed a bug it cuts like 4 trees then it stops and hovers the mouse ove then invent game tab is there any way i can fix

Read full topic

item.title: More help!
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

That is much less detectable, and just as good as using Mouse and MMouse, but 4 times the work.

‘Mouse’: moves your mouse in a smooth motion to the point that you specify, it does a wait for a random of 0 to 100 milliseconds, and then clicks. Very humanlike.

MoveMouse(45,134); wait(random(100)); HoldMouse(45,134,true); wait(random(100)); ReleaseMouse(45,134,true);
Can be converted and condensed to:

Mouse(45,134,true);

‘MMouse’: It’s basically the MoveMouse, but more smooth, and hovers over where you specify.

I hope I cleared that up for you a little better

Read full topic

item.title: More help!
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

thanks a lot and whats that sotw winner it wasnt there a couple of days ago if its something good congratulations.oh and btw i dont know how to use mmouse but is this code less detectable its the best i know[code]//script only cuts oak
//have runescape map/veiw at it highest point facing north
//stand behind lumbridge general store
//see http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,187285.msg1691689.html#new
//for picture
//power cutter by jason aka sonny bill 9
//setup
//drag cross hair onto rs screen
//press play
//login,cut and drop
program powercutter;
{.include srl/srl.scar}
{.include srl/srl/skill/woodcutting.scar}
const
username =’’; //add your username
password =’’; //add your password
procedure login;
begin
Movemousesmooth(468, 291);
wait(1000);
holdmouse(468, 291,true);
wait(100);
releasemouse(468, 291,true);
wait(1000);
sendkeyswait(username,400,100);
wait(1000);
Movemousesmooth(373, 274);
wait(1000);
holdmouse(373, 247,true);
wait(100);
releasemouse(373, 247,true);
wait(1000);
sendkeyswait(password,400,100);
wait(1000);
Movemousesmooth(331, 320);
wait(1000);
holdmouse(331, 320,true);
wait(100);
releasemouse(331, 320,true);
wait(1000);
Movemousesmooth(398, 344);
wait(7000);
holdmouse(398, 344,true);
wait(100);
releasemouse(398, 344,true);
wait(3000);
end;

procedure drop;
begin
gametab(4);
status(‘Dropping’);
if (invfull = true) then
mousespeed:=1;
dropto(1,28);
wait(2000+random(550));
end;

procedure cut;
begin
movemousesmooth(233, 216)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(3000)
holdmouse(233, 216,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(233, 216,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(255, 14)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(3000)
holdmouse(255, 14,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(255, 14,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(274, 320)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
holdmouse(274, 320,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(274, 320,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
repeat until(invfull)
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
SetUpSRL;
Cleardebug;
login;
cut;
if (invfull) then
drop;
repeat until(false)
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: More help!
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

This script will work, but once again, try to stay away from MoveMouse and ClickMouse. Please.
I guess this is a good start. Just keep at it and you will see improvement.
